reviews.review: This is honestly a great game, from the story building to the voice acting, well GLaDos's voice, I really liked it, haven't played the second game yet so... wish me luck
Отличный геймплей.Но сюжет скучен и короток.Также много отсылок на HL2

玩法特别，独树一帜，我很喜欢。剧情有，也有一定深度，机器人的“啰里啰嗦”还是挺有意思的。
关卡难度有，但不是特别难的，就是不适合那些容易晕的人（天知道我是怎么做到在空中翻滚的同时瞄准了对面的墙，尤其是那个连跳4阶的关）。
而且，找路这个我也是醉了，虽然有红字指路，但我仍然觉得好难找到路。但是我也可以理解成这就是这个游戏的一个特色。
然后是在一个通风管道的地方，也是第一次出现火箭的关卡，我也是服了我自己，硬是用椅子和机箱堆了一个台阶，的亏还是有传送门的，不然一次次运都不知道要卡多久。
但是总得来说，这还是个好游戏，10分的话我给8分。
Если что это вселеная одна и халф флаиф
This is the game I am still trying to find in other puzzle games.
Советую. Игра, в которой надо реально подумать.
Really good game, most of the bugs are really difficult to do on accident so it safely seperates people playing for fun and speedrunning.
Хорошая игра, головоломка с середины, и на конце игры.
the cake is a lie shhh
A game that everyone can play. Absolutely no reason not to buy during any sale. Definitely had the most fun playing it.

v社试水之作，在那个年代这样的游戏已经相当惊艳了
关卡难度不总体高，但是后面两三关感觉跟前面的难的不是一个档次了。。。
最后的逃跑寻路有点难。。。
Small puzzle game with flavor. You'll prob like it
pretty fun, would rekemend for others.

its a good game

i killed a turret with a bucket
Its really short but fun and Def worth the 2$ on sale

I have never been a fan of puzzle games but had picked up portal through the legendary "Orange Box" by Valve themselves. I gave it a try and I highly recommend that you buy Portal. 

It is a great puzzle game with a well-written story and is also great for people like me who do not like puzzle games.

After completing the game, I decided to buy the second game in the Portal series which goes by the creatively named "Portal 2" and have started playing it.

tl;dr If you aren't a fan of puzzle games, Portal is an amazing game and it also has a well-written story which might make you want to buy Portal 2.
Game is challenging not gonna lie, i passed whole campaign and am still going trough bonus levels. The game is worth the price. If you think on buying it, DO IT, DO NOT HESITATE
It's a good game, that you can beat under 3 hours

Antes que nada tengo que decir que no soy de escribir reseñas,pero este juego, este JUEGAZO se lo merece, al inicio uno pude pensar que es uno mas de los juegos de puzzles con un buen toque de comedia, pero entre más niveles pasan, el juego simplemente se hace mas profundo. La parte final, es simplemente... hermosa, si tubiera que definir a portal en una palabra seria: Perfecto

I first played this in 2012 on a friends computer and loved it. Still rings true today. I have a few visual issues which is bothersome, but I only paid a buck or two for this fantastic title.
very fun and short game very nice

This game is constantly throwing puzzles at you in a fun and interesting way. As well as having lore and even little easter eggs. The whole game blind is challenging I'll admit but, when you've completed the game and attempt to retry It's a cakewalk. 9/10 

TLDR; great game jam packed with fun and lore.

loved the credits
yes im serious

Primeiro jogo da série Portal, trazendo vários puzzles utilizando a portal gun, arma que possibilita colocar no cenário dois portais interligados, trazendo mecânicas muito interessantes para o jogo. Porém o grande destaque do jogo para mim é a história e lore do jogo, pois no final do jogo você percebe o que realmente está acontecendo.
This game scared the sh*t out of me. I thought this was puzzle only, no story. Boy, how wrong I was.
The cake was delicious and there were vegan options. 11/10

no les miento yo me compre el juego primero porque estaba en oferta y porque me lo recomentaron, dios como explico este juego es un gran juego corto pero con una gran historia ahora me estoy pasando el 2 pero 100% recomentado el 1 y si te gusta el 2 lo unico es que son algo dificiles los niveles pero bueno
ta buenisimo compralo es el mejor juego de la vida :p2aperture:
Eh uma delicia de jogar, e eh mais daora ainda tentar fazer 100%

A really good game, with really good puzzle, mostly the advanced ones.
It has some bugs, but is a great game.

It's a very good game, all I can do is recommend it, the main antagonist is a curiously funny character and the end of the game too. I know Portal 2 is more challenging than this first title, but seriously, you don't lose anything by playing this one first, as it's also very good

Portal é um jogo de ação/puzzle em primeira pessoa, cada fase lhe faz explorar um pouco mais da mecânica do game. game simples mas não deixa de ser bom, único mal que achei, foi a historia ser muito curta.

good puzzle game n all, don't spoil it for yourself
only downside is if you don't pay attention to the lore then it becomes boring af, so i suggest you only get it if you like puzzles and love looking in lore

don't just listen to reviews such as "if you don't own this you shouldn't have a steam account" or "buy this right now or you're gay" because this game can be trash, and i admit it
however

the game is excellent, unique, creative, and amusing
It's both challenging enough to be interesting, and short enough to not be tedious

i suggest you to get the game 
make sure to take a look at other actual reviews of portal though because this one explains nothing
"Fast thingy goes in, fast thingy goes out."
This game is really good, its a fun puzzle game though there isn't much to do after you beat it. Also I noticed a ton of screen tearing but that could be the game showing its age or my computer.
parfait dommage que le "mode histoire" soit court
Momentum, a function of mass and velocity, is conserved between portals. In layman's terms, speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out.

10 numara oyun başka söze gerek yok

Excellent puzzle game with lot of challenges. Completely innovative gameplay at its time. Very good environment and thematic. You will want to keep playing and playing to see what happens at the end, and even then you will for sure want to replay it right away.
Excellent price specially on discount.
Отличная игра. Геймплей интересный и не сложный, сюжет захватывающий. Несмотря на довольно старую графику игра выглядит отлично и атмосферно. Прохождение сюжета не займет много времени;)

Jogo simplesmente fantástico! 

- Possui uma historia incrível!
- Possui ótimos quebra-cabeças e desafios! 
- Jogabilidade boa! 
- Jogo extremamente leve e roda em qualquer computador da atualidade!
- Trilha sonora boa!
- Tempo de gameplay dura entorno de 2 - 5 horas!
- Gráficos bons para a sua época!

O jogo vale cada centavo! Com certeza esse jogo vai para a minha listas de jogos favoritos! Recomendo demais!
Not too long, but a great game nonetheless. Wait until it's on sale for 2$ and pick it up
